name: Horizon Group USA Assorted Self Adhesive Foam Shapes, Multicolored
short_description: 750+ FOAM STICKER SHAPES: From stars to circles to hearts in 2 sizes, you’ve got 6 classic geometric shapes needed to create a masterpiece!

MESS-FREE CRAFTING: Give your artwork a pop when you accent and detail posters, notebooks, scrapbooks, picture frames, and more with colorful and assorted shapes. Simply peel off the backing and attach it to your project for no mess!
EXCELLENT REWARD SYSTEM: Geometric stickers make great reward system treats! As a child or student excels, fill up a chart with their favorite shape sticker to track their progress.
PREMIUM EVA FOAM: Our craft foam is pliable and sturdy, perfect for crafting that won’t tear easily. It’s highly flexible, doesn’t carry an odor, and even floats!
PACK INCLUDES: Assorted Adhesive Foam Shapes (4oz)
product_description: Discover all the ways you can get creative with Assorted Adhesive Foam Shapes by Horizon Group USA! Complete with over 750 shapes in 2 sizes with a vibrant assortment of colors and shapes, this mega-pack of adhesive shapes is the perfect addition to any DIY project in the craft room or the classroom. Simply peel the protective covering from the back of any rectangle, triangle, circle, star, square, or heart, then stick it onto your project! Whether you’re collaging, scrapbooking, or working on a school or craft project, the easy-to-peel backing of these shapes makes crafting fun and mess-free. No gluey mess! You can adhere them to almost anything, from wood to canvases and fuzzy crafts. Feel like adding a little extra embellishment? Decorate with sequins, gemstones, glitter glue, or paint to make your shapes unique! There are endless ways for any artist ages 6 & up to explore their creativity with these Assorted Adhesive Foam Shapes, just visit the Craft Project Ideas website for inspiration!
product_details: Item dimensions L x W x H 7.45 x 2.15 x 6.4 inches

Water Resistance Level Not Water Resistant

name: 600Pcs Foam Stickers,Foam Shape Stickers for Kids 6Colors,Self Adhesive Small Star Circle Heart Geometric Sticker for Preschool Art Craft Classroom Supplies Scrapbook Home Party Decor(6,Multicolor)
short_description: 600Pcs Foam Shape Stickers:This pack contains 6 sheets with 600pcs of foam shape stickers. It features lovely geometric shapes such as stars, circles, hearts, rectangles, squares, and triangles, 6 vibrant colors: green, yellow, purple, red, orange, and blue. This abundant quantity allows multiple children to share and create together, making it perfect for classroom activities and party handicrafts

Excellent Foam Material:Our foam shape stickers are made of high-quality EVA foam, featuring a uniquely soft and slightly springy texture. The ideal thickness allows little fingers to grip, position, and stick them with ease. They adhere smoothly to paper and other craft surfaces, ensuring a frustration-free creative experience that helps children feel a strong sense of accomplishment

Fun Educational Tools:This geometric sticker set is an excellent early childhood education tool. By touching and sticking shapes like stars, circles, and hearts, children can easily build their understanding of basic geometric forms. Teachers and parents can use the stickers to guide kids in shape recognition and sorting games, turning abstract concepts into fun, hands-on learning.The six bright colors in the set are ideal for teaching color recognition. Kids can identify different colors during play and later progress to more challenging activities like color matching and sorting. These activities help develop their observation and logical thinking skills

Self-Adhesive Design:These self-adhesive foam stickers stick perfectly to scrapbooks, paper, cardboard, plastic and more. Simply peel off the backing and press them into place—no extra tools, no messy glue. This user-friendly design saves time and effort, letting kids and adults focus on their creativity

Wide Applicable Occassion:These foam geometry stickers suit various scenarios. They can be easily applied to surfaces like water bottles, scrapbooks, greeting cards, envelopes, phone cases, cups, photo frames, and laptops, adding vibrant, creative touches. Beyond serving as home craft materials, they also work well for holiday cards, party decor, and gift wrapping—making them an excellent choice for school projects and festive decorations
